name: hacktiv8-project4
description: Hacktiv8 - Intro To NodeJS - Final Project 4

scripts.dev:db:setup: sequelize db:drop --env development && sequelize db:create --env development && sequelize db:migrate --env development
scripts.test:db:setup: sequelize db:drop --env test && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.prod:db:setup: sequelize db:drop --env production && sequelize db:create --env production && sequelize db:migrate --env production

author: Faruq, Perdana, Rio
